description: This file defines a front-end UI component for an introductory page of a quiz application, built using the Lightning SDK. It creates a centered panel with a title, subtitle, buttons for starting the quiz and getting help, and a tip element that appears on user interaction.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A Lightning component representing the intro page with title, buttons, and tip message.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's state with layout parameters, labels, and tip message.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns child components used within this component, specifically a Button component.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up event handlers for the start and help buttons to navigate to the quiz and display tips.
